slogan: Empowering the next generation of Web3 builders, thinkers, and creators

list-question.question1: Is it safe to store funds on Asterium?
list-question.question2: How fast does the exchange take place?
list-question.question4: Are there any fees for withdrawals?

list-answer.answer1: Security is our top priority. We use advanced technologies to protect user data and funds, and strictly adhere to Uzbek legislation regarding cryptocurrency transactions.
list-answer.answer2-1: Deposits and withdrawals are available using HUMO/VISA/Mastercard bank cards in UZS and USD fiat currencies. You can also deposit funds from our partner Garant Bank or via SWIFT from anywhere in the world.
list-answer.answer2-2: It is also possible to receive and send (on/off chain) crypto assets to well-known exchanges and non-custodial wallets.
list-answer.answer2-3: Fiat currency withdrawals are available to HUMO cards, and crypto assets can be withdrawn to well-known exchanges and non-custodial wallets.
list-answer.answer3: The KYC (identity verification) procedure depends on the user's citizenship. Registration is only available to users over 18 years of age, and detailed instructions will be provided during the registration process.
list-answer.answer4: Fees depend on the transaction type and crypto asset. Detailed fee information will be available after registering on the platform.
